oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Real picture postcard of American soldiers with mess kits
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This real photo postcard shows five doughboys standing in front of a building with an open door to their right rear. The men are in uniform and each is holding a mess kit and canteen cup in his hands. The uniforms show a good deal of variety, especially in their overseas caps, tunics and footwear. A sign reading "PROPHYLATIC STATION" and a small Red Cross flag hang over the door.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
